overview: “AntiBody” is about an emotional state during the times of the pandemic. Feeling the vulnerability of the body, “AntiBody” becomes a form of resistance, physically and psychologically. It’s also about movement and the lack thereof. While I was working on this piece, I was reading about the therapeutical properties of the Orphic hymns, Gurdjieff’s sacred movements and the synthetic organisms called Xenobots.
title: Antibody
